ordersText.title: A SINGLE THRUST
ordersText.general: If this advance order results in a combat, you may play an additional combat card during the first round. *newline* However, after each round of combat your combat cards are discarded and do not carry over to future rounds. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: PURE GENESEED
ordersText.general: While resolving this order you may spend forge tokens as if they were cache tokens. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: SHEER PERFECTION
ordersText.general: Your combat deck may consist of 8 cards. If there are 10 cards in your combat deck when you purchase combat upgrades, you may discard an additional pair of combat cards from your deck. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: SONIC AMPLIFIERS
ordersText.general: Enemy bastions do not prevent this orbital strike. *newline*  During this orbital strike you may spend 2 [B] to destroy a structure on the targeted world. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: UNBRIDLED HEDONISM
ordersText.general: While resolving this order there is no limit on the number of upgrades you may purchase of each type. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

eventsText.title: A FEAST TO REMEMBER
eventsText.general: *newpara* Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* Discard this scheme when collecting materiel in the Refresh phase. Choose a system and collect materiel from all friendly worlds in that system again.

eventsText.title: BEGUILEMENT
eventsText.general: *newpara* Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* Discard this card at the start of an opponent's turn. That opponent must choose one of their order tokens on the game board and move it to the bottom of its respective stack. Then he skips his turn.

eventsText.title: SHE IS NEVER SATED
eventsText.general: *newpara* Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* Discard this scheme after resolving your next advance order. You must immediately resolve this advance order again.

eventsText.title: THE DARK PRINCE BECKONS
eventsText.general: *newpara* Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* Discard this scheme at the start of a combat on a world with friendly units or structures. Replace 1 of your opponent's CL0 units with a Pleasure Seeker from your reserve.

eventsText.title: DANCE OF THE DEMONETTES
eventsText.general: *newpara* Return any number of Pleasure Seekers from your faction board and place them on any friendly worlds.

eventsText.title: SHE GROWS BORED OF THE GAME
eventsText.general: *newpara* Each opponent may decide, in secret, to claim any one of their unclaimed objectives. If any opponent claims an objective, you may claim one of your unclaimed objectives.

eventsText.title: PRIDE BEFORE THE FALL
eventsText.general: *newpara* Choose a player. That player must retun one of their claimed objectives to any enemy world.

eventsText.title: YOUNGEST AMONG THE GODS
eventsText.general: *newpara* Immediately place 1 order token in any legal system following the usual order token placement rules.

combatText.title: CONTAGIOUS ROUNDS
combatText.general: You must assign 1 damage to any unit. That damage can rout the chosen unit.
combatText.unit: Plague Marine/Pestilaan: Gain 1 [B] if the chosen unit was not destroyed by the damage. Gain 2 (B) if the chosen unit was friendly.

combatText.title: DESEASED BLADES
combatText.general: Gain 1 (B) for each of your combat cards in play.
combatText.unit: Poxwalker/Plague Marine/Pestilaan: Gain 1 (B) if you have any [M].

combatText.title: MIASMA AND ROT
combatText.general: Gain 1 (S) for each of your combat cards in play.
combatText.unit: Poxwalker/Plague Marine/Pestilaan: Gain 1 (S) if you have any [M].

combatText.title: PLAGUE PACT
combatText.general: If any unit would be destroyed during this combat round, it is routed instead.
combatText.unit: Poxwalker/Plague Marine/Pestilaan: After the Assess Damage step, gain 1 [M] for each unit that was routed during this combat round.

combatText.title: PUTRESCENT VITALITY
combatText.unit: Poxwalker/Plague Marine/Pestilaan: Convert any [D] to [S] until you have more [S] than [D] of any other type.

combatText.title: DEATH TOLL
combatText.general: Immediately check this area's unit capacity, and each player must destroy units in excess of the capacity.
combatText.unit: Blight-hauler/Pestilaan: Gain 1 (B) for each unit destroyed as a result of this card's general ability.

combatText.title: PLAGUECRAFT
combatText.unit: Poxwalker/Executor: All units' health value is reduced by 1 to a minimum of 1 until the end of this combat.

combatText.title: REVOLTING RESILIENCE
combatText.general: Gain 1 (S) for every shield icon on your cards in play, to a maximum of 3 (S).
combatText.unit: Plague Marine/Blight-hauler/Pestilaan: If you have 3 (S), convert up to 2 [S] to [M].

combatText.title: BLIGHT LAUNCHERS
combatText.general: Your opponent must immediately suffer 1 damage for each of your [M].
combatText.unit: Plague Marine/Blight-hauler/Pestilaan: If no units were destroyed as a result of this card's general ability, gain 1 [M].

combatText.title: THE DEAD WALK
combatText.unit: Poxwalker/Blight-hauler: Place a free reinforcement token in this area for each routed enemy unit.

combatText.title: IN DEATH'S SHADOW
combatText.general: If you have more units in this area than your opponent, he must rout 1 unit.
combatText.unit: Pestilaan/Executor: Gain (B) equal to the highest morale value among routed enemy units.

combatText.title: SPREAD CONTAGION
combatText.general: You and your opponent must immediately suffer damage equal to the difference between your [M].
combatText.unit: Poxwalker/Plague Marine/Blight-hauler/Crawler: *newline* Gain 1 [M] if an enemy unit was destroyed by this card's general ability. *newline* Gain 1 [M] if a friendly unit was destroyed by this card's general ability.

combatText.title: MORTARION'S REGRET
combatText.general: Each of your combat cards in play provides an additional morale icon.

combatText.title: THE SEVENTH PLAGUE
combatText.unit: Crawler/Executor: For each of your (S) that did not block damage this round of combat, gain 1 (B) at the beginning of the next round.
